headline: Warren Buffett Just Bought Domino's Pizza Stock. Should You Follow Him?
summary: Berkshire Hathaway's (NYSE: BRK.A) (NYSE: BRK.B) quarterly 13-F filings always have a few surprises.  The updates show the stocks that Buffett's conglomerate has bought and sold in the previous quarter.  The biggest surprise this time around seemed to be Berkshire's purchase of Domino's Pizza (NYSE: DPZ), its biggest purchase in the quarter.
